examples.example: 除了学习课本知识以外，我们还应该多参加社会实践活动。

translate.english: In addition to learning textbook knowledge, we should also participate in more social practice activities.

examples.example: 除了工作以外，我们也要学会享受生活。

translate.english: Besides work, we also need to learn to enjoy life.

examples.example: 除了努力工作以外，我们也要关注自己的身心健康。

translate.english: In addition to working hard, we should also pay attention to our physical and mental health.
